articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: ‘Even 14 runs-per-over can be chased’: Gaikwad defends Prasidh post 0/68 outing - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Prasidh Krishna created an unwanted record for worst bowling figures by an Indian during the 3rd T20I vs Australia. | Cricket
articles.content: Team India faced a crushing five-wicket defeat at the hands of Australia in the third T20I of the five-match series on Tuesday. Despite posting a mammoth score of 222/3 in 20 overs, the visitors succ… [+2249 chars]
